definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: curtain, before Most Holy Place, in tabern. (P) (prop. that which habitually shuts off, i.e. *parrâku (Lag:BN 88) Kö:ii. 1, 201);—´[[פ]] abs. Ex 26:31 + 17 t. P; cstr. [[הַמָּסָָח]] ´[[פ]] Ex 35:12, Ex 39:34, Ex 40:21, Nu 4:5, [[הַקּׂדֶשׁ]] ´[[פ]] Le 4:6, [[הָעֵדוּת]] ´[[פ]] 24:3; in temple 2Ch 3:14.
